news.title: Applebee’s and IHOP to Revolutionize Dining with AI Technology
news.body: Applebee’s and IHOP, under Dine Brands, are rolling out AI technology across 3,500 locations to boost customer service and optimize operations. This move could set a new benchmark in the restaurant industry for digital engagement and operational efficiency, potentially influencing how restaurants nationwide adopt technology.

news.title: X, Formerly Twitter, Ventures into Fintech with Trading Services
news.body: X, previously known as Twitter, is expanding into trading and financial services, including potential offerings of debit and credit cards. This strategic pivot could transform X into a key player in the fintech space, challenging traditional financial institutions and tech companies alike.

news.title: UK Government Expands Open Banking to Boost Economy by £28 Billion
news.body: The UK's Smart Data Group is set to extend open banking principles to other sectors, potentially unlocking £28 billion in economic value. This initiative marks a significant advancement in data-driven financial services, promoting innovation and consumer benefits across various industries.

news.title: Coinbase Launches Stablecoin Payment Service for Global Merchants
news.body: Coinbase has introduced a new service enabling merchants worldwide to accept payments in USDC, a popular stablecoin. This development not only simplifies digital transactions but also strengthens Coinbase’s foothold in the evolving cryptocurrency payment landscape.

news.title: Visa Advocates for Financial Institutions to Adopt Stablecoin Strategies
news.body: Visa is enhancing its blockchain-based settlement capabilities for USD transactions in the CEMEA region, emphasizing the critical role of stablecoins in the financial sector. This move suggests a near-future where all financial institutions might need robust stablecoin strategies to stay competitive.
